protein.specific_function: Catalyzes direct attachment of p-Tyr (Tyr) to tRNAPhe. Permits also, with a lower efficiency, the attachment of m-Tyr to tRNAPhe, thereby opening the way for delivery of the misacylated tRNA to the ribosome and incorporation of ROS-damaged amino acid into proteins.

go_class.description: ligase activity, forming aminoacyl-trna and related compounds

reference.reference_text: Bullard JM, Cai YC, Demeler B, Spremulli LL: Expression and characterization of a human mitochondrial phenylalanyl-tRNA synthetase. J Mol Biol. 1999 May 14;288(4):567-77.
